§ 7484. Change of incumbent in office When the incumbent of the office of Secretary changes, no substitution of the name of his successor shall be required in proceedings pending before any appellate court reviewing the action of the Tax Court. (Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 891; Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1906(b)(13)(A), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1834.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1976—Pub. L. 94–455 struck out “or his delegate” after “Secretary”.
